articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Indian stock market: 8 key things that changed for market overnight - Gift Nifty, Nvidia share rally to US retail sales | Stock Market News - Mint
articles.description: Indian stock market: Asian markets traded higher, while the US stock market ended in the green with the Nasdaq and S&P 500 closing at record highs, boosted by Nvidia share price rally along with gains in other chip stocks.
articles.content: Indian stock market: The domestic equity benchmark indices, Sensex and Nifty 50, are expected to open higher at record levels on Wednesday following upbeat global market cues.Asian markets traded hig… [+4869 chars]
